Field 7 Mighty Mech with a total of 14 Star Levels and reach level 10 to activate MECHA-MERGE PROTOCOL.

For every 15 ally champions that die, gain a random component (max 3).

augments.desc: Summon a magical hero from another universe to fight for you. This hero is a Prodigy this game.

augments.desc: Summon a magical hero from another universe to fight for you. This hero is a Sorcerer this game.

augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

augments.desc:
After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

augments.name: Latent Forge
augments.desc: After 4 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

augments.name: Low Interest Rates
augments.desc:
Your max interest is capped at 4 gold but you gain 2 gold at the start of every player combat.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

augments.name: Luchador Circlet
augments.desc: Gain a Luchador Emblem and a Dr Mundo.

augments.name: Luchador Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Luchador Emblem.

augments.name: Luchador Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Luchador Emblem, a Sterak's Gage, and a Dr Mundo.

augments.name: Lucky Gloves
augments.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

augments.name: Lucky Gloves+
augments.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves now, then another after 4 player combats.

augments.name: Lucky Streak
augments.desc:
Gain a Gambler's Blade and a Magnetic Remover.

Gambler's Blade helps you gain gold.

augments.name: Lucky Streak
augments.desc: Gain a Gambler's Blade and a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Luden's Echo I
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 35-80 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Luden's Echo II
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Luden's Echo III
augments.desc: Every 60 Mana spent, your units next instance of Ability damage deals an additional 110-300 (based on current Stage) magic damage to the target and a nearby enemy.

augments.name: Mace's Will
augments.desc: Gain a Sparring Gloves. Your team gains 8% Attack Speed and 20% Critical Strike Chance.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor I
augments.desc: Allies without items equipped gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor II
augments.desc: Allies without items equipped gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor III
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 65 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Malicious Monetization
augments.desc: Gain 2 gold. For the next 3 rounds, enemy champions drop 2 gold when killed.

augments.name: Manaflow I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back row gain 2 additional Mana per attack.

augments.name: Manaflow II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back row gain 3 additional Mana per attack.

augments.name: Marksman's Toolbox
augments.desc: Gain a Sniper's Focus. In 3 rounds, gain a Fishbones.

augments.name: Martyr
augments.desc: Whenever one of your allies die, your team heals for 9% of their max Health.

augments.name: Max Cap
augments.desc: Your max level is 7. Gain 1 Tactician's Shield which increases your team size by +1, and 50 gold.

augments.name: Level Up!
augments.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 12 immediately.

augments.name: Medium-End Shopping
augments.desc: Gain a 1 gold. Champions appear in the first 3 slots of your Shop as if you were 1 level higher.

augments.name: Memory Bank
augments.desc: Gain a Jhin and Morgana. Dynamos gain 4% Damage Amp. After they spend 7000 Mana, gain a Zhonya's Paradox and an Aurora.

augments.name: Mentorship I
augments.desc: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 10% Attack Speed and 100 Health.

augments.name: Mentorship II
augments.desc: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 16% Attack Speed and 220 Health.

augments.name: Mess Hall
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your champions gain 8% Attack Speed and attacks also hurl 2 delicious projectiles that deal 25(%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

augments.name: Metabolic Accelerator
augments.desc: Gain 2 player health after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

augments.name: Missed Connections
augments.desc: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

augments.name: Wellness Trust
augments.desc: Round Start: Gain 3 gold. If you have at least 40 gold, heal 2 player Health.

augments.name: Money Laundering
augments.desc: You earn no interest, but at the start of every player combat round gain 1 Gold per 2 units on your bench.

augments.name: Moonlight
augments.desc: Combat start: 1 random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 3-star for that round and gains 40% Attack Damage and 40% Ability Power.

augments.name: New Contenders
augments.desc: Grant 50% of Supreme Cell's bonus to all champions on your team. Any champion on your team can now become the Supreme Cell. Gain a Kai'Sa and Kennen.

augments.name: New High Score
augments.desc: Cyberbosses increase their score when they deal damage. When they reach the next high score gain bonus loot. Gain a Veigar and a Poppy.

augments.name: New Recruit
augments.desc: Gain +1 max team size and a Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Nine Lives
augments.desc: Set your current and max player Health to 9. On combat loss, you only lose 1 health and gain loot. You can't gain health.

augments.name: Nine Thousand Volts
augments.desc: Gain a Kennen. Your strongest Kennen becomes a ranged Marksman. He throws piercing Shurikens that can stun and deal magic damage.

augments.name: Noble Sacrifice
augments.desc: When your first ally dies each combat, grant your team 25 + 10% of that ally's Armor and Magic Resistance.

augments.name: NO SCOUT NO PIVOT
augments.desc: Champions that fight in player combat cannot be benched or sold. Your team gains 1% Health, and 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power after player combat.

augments.name: Not Today
augments.desc: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain 35% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Magic Wand
augments.desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 18 Ability Power.

augments.name: On a Roll
augments.desc: Whenever you star up a champion that you fielded last combat, gain 2 free Shop rerolls. Gain 2 gold.

augments.name: One Buff, Two Buff
augments.desc: Gain a Red Buff, a Blue Buff, and a Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: One For All I
augments.desc: Your team gains 2% max Health and 1% Damage Amp for each unique one-cost champion on your board. Gain 2 one-costs.

augments.name: One For All II
augments.desc: Your team gains 3% max Health and 1.5% Damage Amp for each unique one-cost champion on your board. Gain 3 one-costs.

augments.name: Endless Hordes
augments.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 12%. Gain 8 gold.

augments.name: Endless Hordes +
augments.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 12%. Gain 18 gold.

augments.name: One, Two, Five!
augments.desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

augments.name: One Twos Three
augments.desc: Gain 1 1-cost champion, 2 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.

augments.name: On The House
augments.desc: Whenever you star up a champion, gain 1 gold. Gain 4 gold now.

augments.name: Overclocked
augments.desc: Your A.M.P. champions with 3 items gain 1 Amp. Gain 4 rerolls, a Naafiri, and a Nidalee.

augments.name: Over Encumbered
augments.desc: For the next stage, you only get 2 bench slots. After, get 2 item components.

augments.name: Overheal
augments.desc: Every third attack deals 110% damage and heals 60% of the damage. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 400 Health.

augments.name: Overwhelming Force
augments.desc:
Gain a Deathblade, an Infinity Edge, a BF Sword, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries or Attack Fighters!

augments.name: Pair of Fours
augments.desc: If your team has exactly 2 4-cost champions, they each gain 504 Health and 28.4% Attack Speed. Gain a random 4-cost.

augments.name: Pandora's Bench
augments.desc: At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost. Gain 6 gold.

augments.name: Pandora's Items
augments.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random component.

augments.name: Pandora's Items II
augments.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 2 random components.

augments.name: Pandora's Items III
augments.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

augments.name: Patience is a Virtue
augments.desc: Each round, gain 2 free rerolls if you did not buy a champion last round.

augments.name: Perfect Form
augments.desc: Gain a Zac. Your strongest Zac becomes a Specialist. He now bounces around the battlefield dealing damage in a one hex radius.

augments.name: Phreaky Friday
augments.desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

augments.name: Phreaky Friday
augments.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

augments.name: Phreaky Friday +
augments.desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

augments.name: Phreaky Friday+
augments.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 2 player combats, gain another.

augments.name: Pick of the Litter
augments.desc: Open a special Shop with 3 free 3-cost champions. You can only pick 1, but you get 2 copies of it.

augments.name: Pick of the Litter+
augments.desc: Open a special Shop with 3 free 4-cost champions. You can only pick 1, but you get 2 copies of it.

augments.name: Piercing Lotus I
augments.desc: Your team gains 5% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. Critical strikes 20% Shred and Sunder the target for 3 seconds.

augments.name: Piercing Lotus II
augments.desc: Your team gains 20% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. Critical strikes 20% Shred and Sunder the target for 3 seconds.

augments.name: Pilfer
augments.desc: Each round, gain a 1-star copy of the first champion you killed last combat. The first time you gain 35 gold worth of champions in this way, gain a Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Pirates
augments.desc: Your units have a rare chance to drop treasure chests when they kill enemy champions.

augments.name: Placebo
augments.desc: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 8 gold.

augments.name: Placebo+
augments.desc: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 14 gold.

augments.name: Plot Armor
augments.desc: Your team gains 8 Armor and Magic Resist. After falling below 50% Health, increase this to 40 for the rest of combat.

augments.name: Pocket Recombobulator
augments.desc: Get 2 Pocket Recombobulators, a consumable that transform a 1 or 2-cost champion into one of a higher cost. They keep their Star level. Also receive 2 Reforgers.

augments.name: Polished Chrome
augments.desc: When you 3-star Nitro champions, they gain 15% Attack Damage, 20 Ability Power, and grant 10 Gold. Gain a Kindred and a Nidalee.

augments.name: Portable Forge
augments.desc:
Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

augments.name: Portable Forge+
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 3 Artifacts.

augments.name: Portable Forge++
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

augments.name: Potions 201
augments.desc: Witch curses last forever. Witch Abilities also curse the nearest uncursed champion. If all champions are cursed, Witches gain 20% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain a Poppy and a Cassiopeia.

augments.name: Powered Shields
augments.desc: While Shielded, your units gain 10% Durability. The first time allies fall below 50% Health, they gain 100-225 Shield (based on Stage) for 3 seconds.

augments.name: Power Leveling
augments.desc: Anima Squad takedowns have a 30% chance to drop an XP orb that sells for 1 XP. Anima Squad units gain 1% Attack Speed for each of your player levels. Gain a Seraphine and Illaoi.

augments.name: Power of Friendship
augments.desc: Star Guardians who start combat adjacent to at least one other Star Guardian gain 1 Mana Regeneration, 20 Armor, and 20 Magic Resist. Gain a Rell.

augments.name: Power Upload
augments.desc:
You can give the Mighty Mech a Power Up. When it has Power Up the Mighty Mech gains 150 Health and 10% Damage Amp.

Gain an Aatrox, a Senna, and a Power Remover.

augments.name: Precise Planning
augments.desc: When you win or lose combat by 4 or fewer units, gain 2 gold next round.

augments.name: Precise Shot
augments.desc: Every 4 seconds, all Sniper champions fire a shot that deals 85% of their Basic Attack Damage to the lowest health enemy in range. Gain a Jhin.

augments.name: Preemptive Protection
augments.desc: Combat start: Protectors shield themselves and their closest ally for 18% of their maximum health. Shields stack. Gain a Rakan.

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 30 Health, 3% Attack Damage, and 3% Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35, 4 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 4% Attack Damage, and 4% Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50, 6 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 7% Attack Damage and 7 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 70, 9% Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Prismatic Destiny
augments.desc: Gain a random Prismatic Augment and 4 gold.

augments.name: Prismatic Pipeline
augments.desc: The next non-player combat round will drop an additional Prismatic Orb full of amazing loot.

augments.name: Prizefighter
augments.desc: Gain 2 item components. Every 5 wins gives you an item component.

augments.name: Prodigy Circlet
augments.desc: Gain a Prodigy Emblem, a Malzahar, and a Needlessly Large Rod.

augments.name: Prodigy Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Prodigy Emblem.

augments.name: Prodigy Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Prodigy Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and an Ezreal.

augments.name: Protagonist
augments.desc: Gain a random 1-cost Champion Augment. After 3 turns, gain a copy of the champion at the start of every turn.

augments.name: Protector Circlet
augments.desc: Gain a Protector Emblem, a Neeko, and a Giant's Belt.

augments.name: Protector Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Protector Emblem.

augments.name: Protector Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Protector Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Neeko.

augments.name: Psychic Forge
augments.desc: Round start Completed Items on benched champions turn into one of their recommended items. Gain a random completed item.

augments.name: Pumping Up I
augments.desc: Your team gains 6% Attack Speed. After each round, they gain 0.5% more. (Current Attack Speed: 6%)

augments.name: Pumping Up II
augments.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed. After each round, they gain 1% more. (Current Attack Speed: 8%)

augments.name: Pumping Up III
augments.desc: Your team gains 16% Attack Speed. After each round, they gain 2% more. (Current Attack Speed: 12%)

augments.name: Pyromaniac
augments.desc: Gain a Red Buff. Your Burns deal 50% increased damage.

augments.name: Quality Over Quantity
augments.desc:
Champions holding exactly 1 item upgrade that item to Radiant. Champions holding Radiant items gain 7% Health. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

Thief's Gloves counts as multiple items.

augments.name: Quiet Quitting
augments.desc: For the next 3 player combats, you cannot use your shop. After, gain 24 gold and a Completed Item Anvil.

augments.name: Radiant Refactor
augments.desc:
Gain a Masterwork Upgrade and 1 component anvil.

Masterwork Upgrade upgrades an item to Radiant!

augments.name: Radiant Relics
augments.desc:
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

augments.name: Raid Boss
augments.desc: Your strongest Bastion champion gains 20% max Health. When other Bastions die, they transfer 20% of their Armor and Magic Resist to it. Gain a Shen and Rell.

augments.name: Raining Gold
augments.desc: Gain 7 gold now and 1 gold every round.

augments.name: Raining Gold+
augments.desc: Gain 18 gold now and 1 gold every round.

augments.name: Reach The Summit
augments.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 10 gold and 50.

augments.name: Reactive Shell
augments.desc: Vanguards gain 8% Health. When the Vanguard Shield ends, deal 50% of the initial Shield as magic damage to their current target. Gain a Skarner and a Vi.

augments.name: Recombobulator
augments.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher (max 5). Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

augments.name: Blistering Strikes
augments.desc: Your team's attacks Burn their targets for 5% of their max Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.

augments.name: Reinforcing Skeleture
augments.desc:
Whenever a Bruiser dies, it permanently gains 55 Health.
Gain a Darius and Alistar.

augments.name: ReinFOURcement
augments.desc: The next 4-cost champion you buy with gold is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 5 gold.

augments.name: Replication
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.

augments.name: Reroll Transfer
augments.desc:
For every 1 unused Augment Reroll, gain 3 free shop rerolls. Gain 1 gold.

Does not include the round this augment is selected.

augments.name: Restart Mission
augments.desc: Remove all champions on your board and bench. Gain 2 random 2-star 3-costs, 3 2-star 2-costs, and 1 2-star 1-cost champion.

augments.name: Return on Investment
augments.desc: When you reroll your Shop 16 times, gain a Tactician's Crown.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer
augments.desc: Gain 12 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer+
augments.desc: Gain 18 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Rigged Shop
augments.desc: Your next shop and every 4 shops will contain all 3-cost champions.

augments.name: Rigged Shop+
augments.desc: Your next shop and every 4 shops will contain all 3-cost champions. Gain 5 rerolls.

augments.name: Ring The Bell
augments.desc: After 15 seconds, your Heavyweight champions gain 30% max Health and 20% Damage Amp. Gain a Kobuko and a Zac.

augments.name: Risky Moves
augments.desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.

augments.name: Radiant Rascal
augments.desc:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

augments.name: Row Rejuvenation I
augments.desc: Your team has 8% Omnivamp, increased by 1% for every champion that starts combat in that same row.

augments.name: Row Rejuvenation II
augments.desc: Your team has 9% Omnivamp, increased by 1.5% for every champion that starts combat in that same row.

augments.name: Cruel Pact
augments.desc: Buying XP costs 5 player health instead of 4 gold. Heal 3 player health before each player combat. Gain 6 now.

augments.name: Salvage Bin
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 8 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

augments.name: Salvage Bin
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 3 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

augments.name: Salvage Bin+
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

augments.name: Sated Spellweaver
augments.desc: After casting an Ability, champions gain 15% Omnivamp for 3 seconds. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 500 Health.

augments.name: Scapegoat
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy and 4 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.

augments.name: Scavenger
augments.desc: The first 5 enemy champions that are killed each combat grant a champion on your team a temporary completed item.

augments.name: Schoolyard Justice
augments.desc: Gain a Garen. Your strongest Garen becomes a Fighter. He no longer Heals, but deals more damage and executes weak enemies.

augments.name: Scoped Weapons
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +2 Attack Range and 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Scoped Weapons II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain infinite Attack Range and 25% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Scoreboard Scrapper
augments.desc: Every round, if you're in the bottom 4, your team permanently gains 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the Top 4, they have 10% more Health.

augments.name: Second Wind
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your team heals 40% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Second Wind II
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 60% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Self-Destruct
augments.desc: Before dying, BoomBots jump on the nearest enemy and deal 350 physical damage + 35% dealt by rockets to adjacent enemies. Gain a Kog'Maw and a Skarner.

augments.name: The Darkness Within
augments.desc: The first 3 Wraith champions to die each combat summon a monstrosity from the Shadow Realm. Gain a Jhin and Zac.

augments.name: Share the Spotlight
augments.desc: Gain a spotlight in the back corner of your board. All units in the spotlight gain 14% Damage Amp, 12% Omnivamp, and 2 Mana per second.

augments.name: Sharing Is Caring
augments.desc: Combat start: You gain 1 gold and your opponent gains 1 gold.

augments.name: Shimmerscale Essence
augments.desc:
Gain a Mogul's Mail. In 5 rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

These items give gold as well as combat power.

augments.name: Shock Treatment
augments.desc: Gain a Statikk Shiv and another after 5 player combats. Your Statikk Shivs grant 10% more Attack Speed and their chain lightning effects deal 30-120% more damage (based on stage level).

augments.name: Shock Treatment+
augments.desc: Gain a Statikk Shiv and another after 3 player combats. Your Statikk Shivs grant 10% more Attack Speed and their chain lightning effects deal 40-125% more damage (based on stage level).

augments.name: Shop Glitch
augments.desc: During non-player combat rounds, your shop refreshes for free every 2.5 seconds for 28 seconds.

augments.name: Shoplifting
augments.desc: After your first shop refresh each turn, gain the highest cost champion for free.

augments.name: Silver Destiny
augments.desc: Gain a random Silver Augment and 2 gold.

augments.name: Silver Destiny+
augments.desc: Gain a random Silver Augment and 4 gold.

augments.name: Silver Destiny++
augments.desc: Gain a random Silver Augment and 7 gold.

augments.name: Silver Spoon
augments.desc: Gain 10 XP.

augments.name: Golden Ticket
augments.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 30% chance to gain a free reroll.

augments.name: Silver Veil
augments.desc: Your team gains 5% Attack Speed and is immune to the first crowd control effect in combat.

augments.name: Slammin'
augments.desc: Gain 1 random component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than consumables), gain 2 XP.

augments.name: Slammin'+
augments.desc: Gain 1 random component(s) and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than consumables), gain 2 XP.

augments.name: Sleight of Hand
augments.desc: Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding this item gain 100 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Slice of Life
augments.desc: Twice per stage, gain a random champion. Its cost increases by Stage. This effect ends after receiving 1 5-cost champion.

augments.name: March of Progress
augments.desc: Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

augments.name: Sniper Circlet
augments.desc: Gain a Sniper Emblem, a Jinx, and a Recurve Bow.

augments.name: Sniper Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Sniper Emblem.

augments.name: Sniper Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Sniper Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Caitlyn.

augments.name: Social Distancing I
augments.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 10% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Social Distancing II
augments.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 16% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Social Distancing III
augments.desc: Combat start: Units with no adjacent allies gain 25% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Solo Leveling
augments.desc: For the next 5 combats, your team size is 1 but the champion you field has massively increased stats. Gain 1 XP for every kill they get. Afterwards, gain 2 item components.

augments.name: Sorcerer Circlet
augments.desc: Gain an Sorcerer Emblem, a Karma, and a Tear of the Goddess.

augments.name: Sorcerer Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Sorcerer Emblem.

augments.name: Sorcerer Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and an Ahri.

augments.name: Soul Fighter Circlet
augments.desc: Gain a Soul Fighter Emblem and a Kalista.

augments.name: Soul Fighter Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Soul Fighter Emblem.

augments.name: Soul Fighter Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Soul Fighter Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Kalista.

augments.name: Space Camp
augments.desc: Whenever you upgrade a 1-cost Crew champion, gain a random 1-3 cost Crew champion. Gain a Malphite.

augments.name: Spare Parts
augments.desc: Get a Nitro Hex Turret that has 33% of your total Chrome. Gain a Shyvana.

augments.name: Spear's Will
augments.desc: Your team gains 12% Attack Damage and 5 Mana. Gain a B.F. Sword.

augments.name: Speed Kills
augments.desc: Rapidfire champions start at 1 stacks and can go to 15. If you win combat within 18 seconds, gain 2 gold. Gain a Twisted Fate and a Kog'Maw.

augments.name: Spellblades
augments.desc: Whenever one of your champion casts, their next attack deals bonus magic damage equal to 120% of their Ability Power.

augments.name: Spellcaster's Toolbox
augments.desc: Gain a Manazane. In 3 rounds, gain a Zhonya's Paradox.

augments.name: Spirit Link
augments.desc: Champions restore 5% of their max Health every 4 seconds. Increase the healing by 0.5% for every 10 missing player Health.

augments.name: Sponging
augments.desc: Combat start: Up to 6 champions with 1 or fewer items gain a copy of a random completed item from the nearest itemized ally.

augments.name: Star Guardian Circlet
augments.desc: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem and a Rell.

augments.name: Star Guardian Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem.

augments.name: Star Guardian Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem, a Steadfast Heart, and a Rell.

augments.name: Starry Night
augments.desc:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain 6 gold.
Chances increase with player level.

augments.name: Starry Night+
augments.desc:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain 8 gold.
Chances increase with player level.

augments.name: Stars Are Born
augments.desc: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 7 gold.

augments.name: Starter Kit
augments.desc:
Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and 8 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

augments.name: Stationary Support I
augments.desc: After 8 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Stationary Support II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Stationary Support III
augments.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Sticks And Stones
augments.desc: Champions that aren't holding items Shred and Sunder enemies for 3 seconds. Physical damage Sunders for 30%, and magic damage Shreds for 30%.

augments.name: Stimpack
augments.desc: Gain 4 components after you lose 50 player health.

augments.name: Strategist Circlet
augments.desc: Gain a Strategist Emblem, a Ziggs, and a Tear of the Goddess.

augments.name: Strategist Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Strategist Emblem.

augments.name: Strategist Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Strategist Emblem, a Janna, and an Adaptive Helm.

augments.name: Subscription Service
augments.desc: Now, and at the start of each Stage, open a Shop of 4 unique 4-cost champions and gain 8 gold.

augments.name: Sunfire Board
augments.desc: Combat Start: Burn all enemies for 15% of their max Health over 15 seconds and reduce healing received by 33%.

augments.name: Superstars I

augments.name: Superstars II

augments.name: Support Cache

augments.name: Support Golem I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Golem that fights for your team, holding 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Support Golem II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Golem that fights for your team, holding 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Support Mining
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies 8 times, gain a random Support Item and remove the Training Dummy.

augments.name: Support Mining+
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies 7 times, gain a random Support Item and remove the Training Dummy.

augments.name: Support Spire
augments.desc: After 10 seconds in combat, a support spire grants Anima Squad a Shield, Attack Speed, or Stuns all enemies. Gain 3 Anima Squad champions.

augments.name: Supreme Cells Circlet
augments.desc: Gain a Supreme Cells Emblem and an Akali.

augments.name: Supreme Cells Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Supreme Cells Emblem.

augments.name: Supreme Cells Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Supreme Cells Emblem, a Last Whisper, and a Kai'sa.

augments.name: Survivor
augments.desc: Gain 4 gold. After 3 players are eliminated, gain 100 more gold.

augments.name: Switching Gears

augments.name: Sword Overflow
augments.desc: Gain 4 B.F. Swords. Your B.F. Swords grant +5% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Table Scraps
augments.desc: After the next 2 carousels, gain one champion that was not taken and its item. Gain 1 gold.

augments.name: Tactician's Kitchen
augments.desc: Gain a random Emblem. After 6 rounds, gain a Tactician's Cape.

augments.name: Tactician's Tools
augments.desc: Gain two Spatulas and 1 Component Anvil.

augments.name: Tagging Spree

augments.name: Phony Frontline
augments.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

augments.name: Teacher's Council
augments.desc: Mentor bonuses are granted to your team regardless of how many Mentors you play. Gain a Kobuko.

augments.name: Teaming Up II

augments.name: Tesla Coil

augments.name: The Chug Bug+

augments.name: The Golden Egg

Gain a Golden Remover and component item anvil.

Golden Remover is an Item Remover with infinite uses.

augments.name: Three's Company
augments.desc: Gain 5 random 3-cost champions.

augments.name: Wise Spending
augments.desc: Every 2 times you purchase a shop reroll, gain 4 XP. Gain 1 gold now.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt I
augments.desc: Your units heal 350 Health on kill.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt II
augments.desc: Your units heal 550 Health on kill.

augments.name: Tiny, but Deadly

augments.name: Titanic Titan

augments.name: Tomb Raider II
augments.desc: Gain 1 completed item anvil. Every time a player is eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

augments.name: Ancient Archives I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits and 3 gold.

augments.name: Ancient Archives II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits and 5 gold.

augments.name: Too Much Candy

augments.name: Training Reward
augments.desc: Gain 5 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Training Reward II
augments.desc: Gain 12 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Training Reward III
augments.desc: Gain 24 gold and a Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Tournament Favorites

Soul Fighters gain Fame when they deal damage. Each Fame breakpoint grants loot. Gain a Naafiri and Kalista.

Fame: ?/1000

Luchadors gain 5% Attack Speed. Whenever you win player combats, Luchadors grow in size and permanently gain 2% Attack Damage and 20 Health. Gain a Dr Mundo and Gnar.

(Total: ?% AD; ? Health)

augments.name: Trade Sector+

augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300-600 Health and 50-70% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

augments.name: Transfusion III

Gain 2 3-cost champions.

augments.name: Trifecta II

Gain 3 3-cost champions. Allies gain 5% Attack Speed.
Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 300 Health and 25% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tri Force II

augments.name: Tri Force III
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 200 Health, 25 starting Mana, and 25% Attack Speed.

augments.desc: Gain 1 random 2-star Tier 1 champions and 1 random 2-star Tier 2 champion.

augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 30% Attack Damage and 30% Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble III
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 40% Attack Damage and 40 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Twin Terror II

augments.name: Two Trick

augments.name: Legend Augment - Gold

augments.name: Unleashed Arcana

Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Carries or Magic Casters!

Gain a Nashor's Tooth, a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Needlessly Large Rod and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Carries!

Your team gains 50 Health. Gain another 6 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

augments.name: Wand Overflow
augments.desc: Gain 4 Needlessly Large Rods. Your Needlessly Large Rods grant +5% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Warpath

Gain a 2-star 2-cost champion. After dealing 80 player damage, gain a chest of high cost champions and items.
(Current: ?)

augments.name: Water Lotus II

augments.name: Windfall
augments.desc: Gain 20 gold.

augments.name: Windfall+
augments.desc: Gain 35 gold.

augments.name: Windfall++
augments.desc: Gain 40 gold.

augments.name: Wolf Unchained
augments.desc: Gain a Sylas. Your strongest Sylas's ability deals more damage and recasts on kill, but his Health gain no longer scales with Ability Power.

augments.name: Woodland Charm

augments.name: Worth the Wait
augments.desc:
Gain a random 1-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion: ???

augments.name: Worth the Wait II
augments.desc:
Gain 2 copies of a random 2-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion: ???

augments.name: Wraith Circlet
augments.desc: Gain a Wraith Emblem and a K'Sante.

augments.name: Wraith Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Wraith Emblem.

augments.name: Wraith Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Wraith Emblem, a Hextech Gunblade, and a Malzahar.

augments.name: You Have My Bow
augments.desc: Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.

augments.name: You Have My Sword
augments.desc: Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Young and Wild and Free
augments.desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 5 gold.

augments.name: 3 Threes
augments.desc: Gain 3 random 2-star 3-cost champions and 3 gold.

augments.name: Advanced Loan
augments.desc: Gain 20 Gold. Your next augment is one tier lower.

augments.name: Advanced Loan+
augments.desc: Gain 33 Gold. Your next augment is one tier lower.

augments.name: Arcane Viktor-y
augments.desc:
After 8 seconds of combat, stun the enemy team for 1.5 seconds. Repeat this after 20 seconds of combat.

TFT Macao Open, 2024

augments.name: Bandle Bounty I
augments.desc: For every Yordle you've unlocked or unlock, gain 2 gold. The Bandle Paths reveal a secret Yordle 10. Gain a Rumble and Lulu.

augments.desc:
Gain a random 2-star 2-cost champion. When you reach Level 7, gain a Thief's Gloves. When you reach Level 9, gain a random 2-star 5-cost champion.

Inkborn Fables Tactician's Crown, 2024

augments.name: Blood Offering
augments.desc: Gain a Bloodthirster. Combat start: Allies holding Bloodthirsters lose 20% Health but gain a 30% Health shield and 10% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Bodyguard Training
augments.desc:
Allies gain 10 Armor and Magic Resist, increased by 3 per player level.

Gizmos & Gadgets Championship, 2022

augments.name: Bringer of Ruin
augments.desc:
Every takedown Atakhan scores permanently grants him 1% Ability Power and 40 max Health. Gain a Briar and a Sion.
(Current Takedowns: ?)

augments.desc: Arcanists gain 1 Mana Regen. After every 150 Mana they spend, a magical effect hits the board. Gain a Lulu and a Kog'Maw.

augments.name: Darkwill's Invasion

augments.desc:
When you reach Level 8, gain 20 Shop rerolls.

Void provides unique Mutations.

augments.desc: Gain a Sunfire Cape. Your team gains 12% Omnivamp when attacking Burning enemies.

augments.name: Gain ? Gold
augments.desc: Gain 21 gold.

augments.desc: Every 5th attack deals bonus true damage equal to 200% Basic Attack Damage.

CyberCity Tactician's Crown, 2025

augments.name: Legion of Threes
augments.desc:
Gain a random Emblem. Your 3-cost champions and all allies equipped with an Emblem gain 200 Health and 12% Attack Speed.

Reckoning Championship, 2021

At the start of each round, if the combined Health of all your unique Bruisers is high enough, gain a reward and increase the threshold (up to four times). Gain a Shen and a Sion.

Easy Lift:? / 3500

augments.name: Max Build
augments.desc:
Gain 10 free Shop rerolls. On Stage 4-5 and 6-1, gain a Champion Duplicator.

Galaxies Championship, 2020

augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Teemo. Singed's damage refreshes Teemo's poisons, and every 100 magic damage Teemo deals grants your strongest Singed 2% Ability Power. Gain a Teemo after each player combat.

augments.desc:
After you earn 50 gold in interest, gain 30 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7. Gain 4 gold now.

Gold earned: ?

augments.desc: Gain 6 gold. Gain an Azir on Stage 3-5. Each time you unlock a Shuriman, gain an ideal item for them.

augments.name: Speedy Double Kill

Fates Championship, 2021

augments.desc: Gain a Spirit Visage. Every 5 seconds, Spirit Visage heals allies within 1 hex for 7.5% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Spreading Roots
augments.desc: Gain 2 random Emblems and 1 gold.

augments.name: Spreading Roots+

augments.name: Staffsmith
augments.desc: Gain 2 random completed items that build from Needlessly Large Rod.

augments.name: Swordsmith
